resources.string: Hey! My name is John Doe and I am currently a Junior attending Bear Creek High. I am hoping to attend a prestigious University in hopes of pursuing a degree Business Economics! The main thing I'm hoping to gain from Future First is a mentor that truly cares about my academics and one that is willing to offer great advice!
My parent\'s have a family business and I want to be able to run the business and carry on the legacy.
Currently in high school thinking about majoring in business.
